heavyandtractortrailertruckdrivers.title: Heavy and Tractor-Trailer Truck Drivers

heavyandtractortrailertruckdrivers.duty: Operate idle reduction systems or auxiliary power systems to generate power from alternative sources, such as fuel cells, to reduce idling time, to heat or cool truck cabins, or to provide power for other equipment.

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.duty: Mix pesticides, herbicides, or fungicides for application to trees, shrubs, lawns, or botanical crops.

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.duty: Fill sprayer tanks with water and chemicals, according to formulas.
pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.title: Pesticide Handlers, Sprayers, and Applicators

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.duty: Lift, push, and swing nozzles, hoses, and tubes to direct spray over designated areas.
pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.title: Pesticide Handlers, Sprayers, and Applicators

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.duty: Identify lawn or plant diseases to determine the appropriate course of treatment.
pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.title: Pesticide Handlers, Sprayers, and Applicators

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.duty: Cover areas to specified depths with pesticides, applying knowledge of weather conditions, droplet sizes, elevation-to-distance ratios, and obstructions.
pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.title: Pesticide Handlers, Sprayers, and Applicators

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.duty: Start motors and engage machinery, such as sprayer agitators or pumps or portable spray equipment.
pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.title: Pesticide Handlers, Sprayers, and Applicators

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.duty: Connect hoses and nozzles selected according to terrain, distribution pattern requirements, types of infestations, and velocities.

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.title: Pesticide Handlers, Sprayers, and Applicators

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.title: Pesticide Handlers, Sprayers, and Applicators

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.duty: Record information about pesticide applications, such as the type used and amount applied.
pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.title: Pesticide Handlers, Sprayers, and Applicators

pesticidehandlerssprayersandapplicators.duty: Use new technology and equipment, such as drones or GPS systems, to apply pesticides more accurately and efficiently.
